message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_ENDDATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than the registration date.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_FV_MAX_PAYMENT_RATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Maximum payment rate must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLE_XFV_REGISTRATIONDATE_LARGE
message.locale: The Registration Date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_EMPLOYER_FV_REGNAME_SHORT
message.locale: The employer registered name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_MIN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_BLANK
message.locale: Minimum payment amount must be specified.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_FV_REGISTEREDNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Registered Name must not be blank.

message.name: INF_ADDRESS_RNFE
message.locale: There was an error reading the primary address for this client.

message.name: INF_CONCERNROLE_NOPRIMARYADDRESSID
message.locale: There is no primary address for this client.

message.name: ERR_SERVICESUPPLIER_SERVICE_XFV_START_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: At least one or more services exist for this Service Supplier with start date earlier than the Service Supplier registration date.

message.name: ERR_SERVICESUPPLIER_SERVICE_XFV_END_DATE_SMALL
message.locale: At least one or more services exist for this Service Supplier with end date later than the end date of the Service Supplier.
